entry.title: Re There's currently 3 badges on @Sismo_eth and developers can build any privacy respecting badges they like using their zk-Proof technology. So expec...
entry.summary: Re There's currently 3 badges on @Sismo_eth and developers can build any privacy respecting badges they like using their zk-Proof technology. So expect more to come but in the meantime you can do these 3 here:â€‚https://alpha.sismo.io/

entry.title: Re Step 4: Mint the Proof-of-Humanity badge to the "destination" wallet. This NFT badge proves you're a human and a project could require its users to...
entry.summary: Re Step 4: Mint the Proof-of-Humanity badge to the "destination" wallet. This NFT badge proves you're a human and a project could require its users to have such a badge in order to be eligible for an airdrop. There's no way to trace a badge back to its "source" account.

entry.title: Re Step 3: Select a "destination" wallet. This is the wallet which you actually use, with your assets and transaction data but which you don't want to...
entry.summary: Re Step 3: Select a "destination" wallet. This is the wallet which you actually use, with your assets and transaction data but which you don't want to dox. Switch wallet and then sign a new message with it to prove you own that wallet as well.

entry.title: Re Step 2: Go to Sign a message to prove you have ownership over this wallet containing the proof-of-humanity profile.
entry.summary: Re Step 2: Go to Sign a message to prove you have ownership over this wallet containing the proof-of-humanity profile.â€‚https://alpha.sismo.io/proof-of-humanity
